Strange Pictures

Uketsu
  • Mystery
  • Weird Fiction
  • Horror
  • Asia

Much like the simple drawings that each chapter is structured around, there is the suggestion of a deeper and darker terror in what’s being suggested but not outright told.

Read review

Hello! My name is Jed.

I write book reviews.

Once every two months, I finish reading a book and I write something about it.
Check back every two months for something new.
